name: Display
description:
These classes allows you to apply the some display like `inline`, `inline-block`, `block`, etc...
on any HTMLElement

package.name: @website/sugarcss-coffeekraken-io
package.description: The frontend toolkit that works for everyone. Experts, professionals and new-comers
package.author: Olivier Bossel <olivier.bossel@gmail.com> (https://coffeekraken.io)

docblocks.name: Display
docblocks.description:
These classes allows you to apply the some display like `inline`, `inline-block`, `block`, etc...
on any HTMLElement

s-display-block.name: s-display:block
s-display-block.description: Apply the display `block` to any HTMLElement

s-display-inline-block.name: s-display:inline-block
s-display-inline-block.description: Apply the display `inline-block` to any HTMLElement

s-display-contents.name: s-display:contents
s-display-contents.description: Apply the display `contents` to any HTMLElement

s-display-flex.name: s-display:flex
s-display-flex.description: Apply the display `flex` to any HTMLElement

s-display-grid.name: s-display:grid
s-display-grid.description: Apply the display `grid` to any HTMLElement

s-display-inline-flex.name: s-display:inline-flex
s-display-inline-flex.description: Apply the display `inline-flex` to any HTMLElement

s-display-inline-grid.name: s-display:inline-grid
s-display-inline-grid.description: Apply the display `inline-grid` to any HTMLElement

s-display-none.name: s-display:none
s-display-none.description: Apply the display `none` to any HTMLElement

docblocks.raw:
/** * * @name Display * @namespace sugar.style.helpers.display * @type Styleguide * @menu Styleguide / Helpers /styleguide/helpers/display * @platform css * @status stable * * These classes allows you to apply the some display like `inline`, `inline-block`, `block`, etc... * on any HTMLElement * * @support chromium * @support firefox * @support safari * @support edge * * @install css * @s.display.classes; * * @cssClass s-display:block Apply the display `block` to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-display:inline-block Apply the display `inline-block` to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-display:contents Apply the display `contents` to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-display:flex Apply the display `flex` to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-display:grid Apply the display `grid` to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-display:inline-flex Apply the display `inline-flex` to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-display:inline-grid Apply the display `inline-grid` to any HTMLElement * @cssClass s-display:none Apply the display `none` to any HTMLElement * * @example html Block *
*

Jacqueline Kulas V

*

Hubert Schaden

*

Terri Langworth
